name: Fantasy Cleanup Corp
description:
You play as a villager in need of money. Luckily the non-shady corporation of Fantasy Cleanup Corp is there to help you survive. You are tasked to clean up the viscera and  avoiding the left over monsters that the heroes left behind after clearing an area. Use your trusty mop to clean and keep monsters at bay.

Controls:

WASD: move

Left Shift: dash

LMB: Clean

RMB: Push

F: Flashlight

ESC: Pause
